name: Golan
description:
Made for Mini Jam 99.

How to Play

  • Use A and D or left and right to turn.
  • Use W and S or up and down to accelerate and decelerate while in the air.
  • Press space to flap your wings.
  • Land on perches at low altitudes.
  • Avoid sharks.
  • Collect all 4 of the artifacts.

Credits

  • Morgan Brown - Design and Code
  • Niall Durcan - Music and Sound Design
  • Claudio Adriano - Art

Uses font Compass Pro from Humble Fonts - Free by somepx.
